answers.answer: The dangers of this kind of surgery are the same as for any surgery for a type 1 diabetic: infection is more of a risk for diabetics than for other people. If her glucose levels are under good control, she has a better chance of healing without any problems. But if glucose levels are kept high, infection is a danger.So we can't say if she will get sick. It really depends on how well her glucose levels are managed and how healthy she is at the time of surgery.
